summary: MY 2000 FORD FOCUS HAS MAJOR PROBLEMS FOR A CAR THAT HAS ONLY 57,000 MILES. THE ENGINE WILL STALL AND DIE ABOUT EVERY 10 SECONDS. THE GAUGES AND ALL OF THE FRONT AND REAR EXTERIOR LIGHTS WILL GO DEAD AND THE CAR WILL JUMP OUT OF GEAR. THE AIR COMPRESSOR FOR THE AIR CONDITIONER IS ALSO SHOT.  *JB
